RAJANI MADDILA

Location : Portland, Oregon                                                           Phone:  (971) 263 1100 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY: 
● Over 12 years of IT experience in Quality Assurance in manual & Mobile apps testing 
● Excellent understanding of SDLC and STLC. Excellent knowledge of service delivery,Retail, digital-Commerce, 
digital-sports, mobility, Remote device management,WLAN & Utilitity applications 
● Good knowledge and work expertise in Manual mobile testing  
● Experienced Test Lead – responsible for the test environment, release verification, handling deployments, solution 
validation, bug scrubbing and release to onsite for next level test activities, coordinating with the Development and 
test teams for quality release in an Agile mode. 
● Experienced in Solution review, Test Strategy/Approach, Test Planning, manual testing (Functional, Regression,

test teams for quality release in an Agile mode.

Validation,web service testing and Performance)  (web services, Web server testing, Java applet), System 
Integration and User/Business Acceptance Testing applying Risk Based Test approach, Test Summary Reporting, 
onsite-offshore co-ordination. 
● Extensive hands on experience on Device Testing (Apple devices - Iphone, Ipod, Ipad, Nano etc; Sportswatch, 
Sportsband, FuelBand, FuelBand SE, ESP, Heart Rate monitor etc.) 
● Familiarity with Swift language. 
● Functioned as Gate Keeper of Defect Management and Reporting using Quality Center & Jira 
● Excellent interpersonal, communication and problem solving skills, excellent Leader and team player, committed, 
result oriented, hardworking with a quest and zeal to learn new technologies and undertake challenging projects.

Portland General Electric is Oregon’s largest utility, with more than a century of experience in power delivery  and

Project Name: Nike+Connect Devices testing:  
 
Description: 
Working on the Nike+connect software used for syncing various devices like FuelbandSE, Fuelband1, Nike+GPS 
Sportwatch, Sportband & ESP.Also will be involved in working on the latest firmware involving internal hardware related 
to the devices with config files and connect.ini. where the factory device reset  testing can be controlled with various 
command tools.

Association of the user to the device, Updating Daily goals, Changing the time& date settings, customization

Association of the user to the device, Updating Daily goals, Changing the time& date settings, customization 
options for new & existing users, calibration of the sportband, profile settings,syncs & uploads with various 
devices, specific to FBSE, GUI display, testing battery levels for various operating systems.
